title: PLD Space secures loan for Miura 5 launch facility
summary:
Spanish launch vehicle startup PLD Space has secured a loan to help fund development of the launch site of its Miura 5 rocket in French Guiana.

title: NASA Experts Share Inspiring Stories of Perseverance to Students
summary: In celebration of National Aviation History Month, experts from NASA’s Armstrong Flight Research Center in Edwards, California, spoke with middle school students during a recent event hosted by NASA’s California Office of STEM Engagement. title: Sols 4732-4735: I’ll Zap You, My Pretty, and Your Pebble Too
summary: Earth planning date: Friday, Nov. 22, 2024 For more than a year, NASA’s Curiosity rover has been climbing through layers of sulfate-rich rock in Gale Crater, where alternating thick light- and dark-toned bands are visible by satellite. title: A Mission at Home and at Work: Caregivers at Johnson Navigate Dual Role With Community Supports
summary: Many team members at NASA’s Johnson Space Center in Houston may recognize Alicia Baker as the talented flutist in the Hispanic Employee Resource Group’s Mariachi Celestial band.
